text: 🚨 Energy War Alert! 🚨Former oil boss warns of price rises after Ukraine infrastructure attacks. 💸🔥Russia's destruction of Ukrainian energy infrastructure will have a dramatic negative effect on European energy prices, says Andriy Kobolyev. 🇷🇺💥The recent strike on Ukraine's gas storage facilities in the west caused a significant spike in European gas prices. 📉Kobolyev emphasizes that the damage to Ukraine's energy network is far more extensive than Russian attacks in the winter of 2022-23. 💔Ukraine needs more weapons to save its energy infrastructure, or there won't be an economy left to reconstruct! 💪🏽🇺🇦#EnergyWar
